title: Fantasy Esports is Recruiting!
body:
Fantasy Esports is a new team that is recruiting for the 2016 season. Multiple members of this team have had previous tournament experience and will be looking to take this team to the OOL (Oceanic open Ladder ) in aim of reaching the OCS ( Oceanic Challenger series) with long term goal of the OPL ( Oceanic Pro league ). Communication will need to be a strong point, you need to be able to make you call outs in a game, Communication is the key to a well rounded team. We as a team want to be able to make strong independent Players that Exceed in their role in solo Queue and make them into Strong Team players.

We are currently on the lookout for:
ADC
Top lane
Support
Mid lane
Jungle
+ two subs

If you role is Already filled Don’t Worry, Because you can always apply for a Substitute role, this does mean you will need to be versatile in many roles. Two or Three roles that you can exceed in would be good for this. As a Substitute you will still be getting the same treatment as the team, you will participate in scrims, practice, and tournaments.  

We will be trialing new members, to ensure they work well with the existing team and to make sure we make the strongest team possible. We aim to create a friendly, competitive atmosphere and will not consider you if you are toxic. Please also ensure you have stable internet as we do not want to have to deal with low priority queues.

With the Current Dynamic Queue it is abusable and we can climb heavily for our solo queue ranks to build our team synergy and prepare us for more controlled environments. For example we can have a 5 man Dynamic Queue and go into a Solo Queue game. We will be able to control the pace of the game this way with our communication, knowledge of how we all play and control. This will be good Synergy practice for the team.  

If your application is accepted and you are moved into Trialing, you will be watched, tested and observed  in multiple games. in these games who you chose to play will be up to you, I suggest you play your best champions and let your talent shine. For example if I was on a trial, I would show off my Renekton top lane or my Rek’sai jungle. 

Copy-paste and fill the application:

[](http://oce.op.gg) Link: 
 
 Reasons of denied application ; 

* You don’t have access to a Microphone
* You Don’t Communicate
* You are not of a sufficient rank/skill level
* If you have Abusive tendencies 
* If you don’t take scrims, practice or tournament games seriously
* You do not dedicate enough time to the team
* If there is no synergy
* Your Availability ( This means if you can only play 1-3 days a week. Low Availability is not good for the team Because it makes it hard to practice) 

Once accepted into the team, we will work together for a length of time, learning each other's playstyles etc. After this point, we will reach out for coaching/analyst staff.

As a Team we will be working on

* Communication
* Vision
* Positioning
* Laning 
* Teamfighting
* skirmishing
* objective control  
* Synergy
